titles.title: I Found The City That Abraham Sought

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I found the city that Abraham sought,
I found the city of God;
I found the people that Jesus has bought,
I found the city of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No shadow of turning, no day nor night,
On streets paved with gold I've trod;
For I live in that city where the Lamb is the light,
I found the city of God.
